trans-unit.source: Represents the permissions that can be granted for file access and operations on memory-mapped files.
trans-unit.target: Representa as permissões que podem ser concedidas acesso a ficheiros e operações nos ficheiros de mapeamento de memória.

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class specifies the access rights for a memory-mapped file and how access attempts are audited.
trans-unit.target: A classe de MemoryMappedFileSecurity Especifica os direitos de acesso para um ficheiro de mapeamento de memória e a forma como as tentativas de acesso são auditadas.

trans-unit.source: This class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe representa os direitos de acesso e auditoria como um conjunto de regras.

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system.
trans-unit.target: A classe de MemoryMappedFileSecurity é uma abstração do sistema de segurança de ficheiros subjacente do Microsoft Windows.

trans-unit.source: It hides many of the details of DACLs and SACLs.
trans-unit.target: -Oculta muitos dos detalhes de DACL e SACLs.

trans-unit.source: Use the MemoryMappedFileSecurity class to retrieve, add, or change the access rules that represent the DACL and SACL of a pipe.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a classe de MemoryMappedFileSecurity para obter, adicionar ou alterar as regras de acesso que representam o DACL e SACL de um pipe.

trans-unit.source: To apply new or changed access or audit rules to a memory-mapped file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar o acesso de novo ou alterado ou regras para um ficheiro de mapeamento de memória de auditoria, utilize o <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>método.</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve access or audit rules from an existing file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso ou auditoria regras a partir de um ficheiro existente, utilize o <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>método.</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile> methods take a MemoryMappedFileSecurity object as a parameter: - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>
trans-unit.target: O seguinte <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>métodos recolhem um objeto de MemoryMappedFileSecurity como um parâmetro:- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29></xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity"> </xref> classe.
